name: Farm Mania: Fruit Smash
description:
Farm Mainia Fruit Smash is a fun puzzle game.Join millions all over the world enjoying Farm Mainia Fruit Smash completely FREE! It is full of love,In the little farm,you need to collect the fruits.Come on,join this fantastic adventure! Switch the adjacent fruits,Make 3 or more with the same type together to eliminate them.Collect cute crops mixed with fruits showed on the top to win the levels before you run out of moves.
This is the cutest and craziest farm game ever! Hurry to get through 300 levels, and unlock a brand-new dreamland now!
Farm Mainia Fruit Smash is an all-new matching puzzle filled with mixed crops madness!
It's a fruity season! Crops grow in your garden!
Farm Mainia Fruit Smash is a completely FREE game!
Come on play Farm Mainia Fruit Smash Fruit Match 2016 !!!

How to play Farm Mainia Fruit Smash Fruit Match Game 2016 :
Extras:

- Use match 3 combinations to make score.
- Match 3 or more identical Farm to crush them!
- Match the fruit until to achieve targets.
- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get. Can you score high enough to earn 3 stars on every level?
- Eye-catching graphics and animations which will bring you into the story-driven adventure
- Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master: all with strategic swiping!
- Great Effect Boom and Fire

Features Farm Mainia Fruit Smash Fruit Match Game 2016 :
- Farm Mainia Fruit Smash easy to play: Switch the fruits to enjoy the game.
- Tip for winnings: Collect all kinds of fruits to get through levels.
- Simple and interesting to challenge yourself.
- More than 300 challenge awaits you
- Lovely UI and cool animation effects.
- No complicated rules!
- Powerful boosts!
- Cute Fruit- Youíll be addicted to them from the first hit!
- Each level is well-designed.From easy to difficult.Amazing!
We try our best to design the most interesting games,but there must be some place not good enough.If you have any suggestions please tell us.Your 5-star reviews or comments or suggestions of improved, is the best support for us.Thank you!

Thank to play Farm Mainia Fruit Smash Fruit Match Game
